  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.contento.se:112476</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CFL</catalog>
            <entry>112476</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Food 2</string>
            <string language="en">Food 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nahrung 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nourriture 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alimento 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Alimento 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρόφιμα 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Alimento 2</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">In this drag’n’drop exercise you practise the food words you learned in Food 1.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
            <string language="en">In this exercise you practice drag'n'drop the food words you learned in Food 1. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">food</string>
            <string language="sv">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">food</string>
            <string language="en">word knowledge</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Übung üben Sie drag'n'drop die 
Nahrungsmittelwörter, die Sie in Nahrung 1 erlernten. Safir - 
Englisch und Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 2 - wieviel ist es?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cet exercice vous pratiquez le drag'n'drop 
les mots de nourriture que vous avez appris en nourriture 1. 
Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour des débutants - module 2 -
combien coûte-t-il ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste exercício você pratica o drag'n'drop as 
palavras que do alimento você aprendeu no alimento 1. Safir - 
vida do inglês e de funcionamento para novatos - módulo 2 - quanto 
é ele?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa esercitazione vi esercitate nel 
drag'n'drop le parole che dell'alimento avete imparato in alimento 1. 
Safir - inglese e vita attiva per i principianti - modulo 2 - 
quanto è esso?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την άσκηση ασκείτε drag'n'drop τις λέξεις 
τροφίμων που μάθατε στα τρόφιμα 1. Safir - αγγλική και 
οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 2 - πόσο 
είναι αυτό;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En este ejercicio usted practica el drag'n'drop 
las palabras del alimento que usted aprendió en el alimento 1. 
¿Safir - inglés y vida laboral para los principiantes - módulo
2 - cuánto es él?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Saphir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nahrung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
